item.title: The Fish Eye Project
item.description: I want to share my new idea. It is, The Fish Eye Project. This idea is simply a camera app which will record a video and backup it to a cloud storage in real time. It’s like facebook or youtube live, but for personal purposes. Especially, privacy is preserved with encryption. Now, for whom this app is for? For everyone. To better explain, I’ll grab an example scenario. Think of you being in a situation where you went shopping and all of a sudden, the security guard accuses you of shoplifting and demand to search you.
